```python
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(\w+ repository|device)"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(\w+ data|TMCs)"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(\w+ repository)"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"(\w+ to exchange \w+ information)"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(\w+ data)"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities
```

```python
import re
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+device"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+object"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+system"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"a\s+system\s+that\s+is\s+.*"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:[A-Z][a-z]+)+\s+events|states|values"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return json.dumps(entities)
```

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = []
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'system|software', sentence)
    if software_system:
        entities.append('Software System')
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'computer|device|phone|screen|interface|tap|hard disk', sentence)
    if physical_device:
        entities.append('Physical Device')
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'office|patient|sun|old|world', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities.append('Environment Object')
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'database|card|stripe|magnetic|disk|hard disk', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities.append('External System')
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'requirements|aim|purpose|meet|user', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities.append('System Requirements')
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'see|data|screen|interface|user', sentence)
    if shared_phenomena:
        entities.append('Shared Phenomena')
    return entities

import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(system|software|app|application)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(mobile|phone|computer|device|machine)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(driver|user|patient|sun|old)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database|card|tap|disk)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(send|receive|get|put|store|access|modify|delete|update|create|read|write)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\b(message|data|information|response|request|query|result|output|input)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    system_requirements += re.findall(r'\b(to|from|via|with|in|on|at|by)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    system_requirements = [req.strip() for req in system_requirements]
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(event|state|value|status|condition|property|attribute|characteristic)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    shared_phenomena += re.findall(r'\b(connected|related|associated|linked|dependent|independent)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    shared_phenomena = [phenomena.strip() for phenomena in shared_phenomena]
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = []
    schema = ['Software System', 'Physical Device', 'Environment Object', 'External System', 'System Requirements', 'Shared Phenomena']
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(Center|System|Software|Application|Network|Database|Server|Client)\b', sentence)
    for system in software_system:
        entities.append({"type": "Software System", "value": system})
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(device|computer|phone|printer|scanner|monitor|keyboard|mouse|screen|display|speaker|headset|microphone|camera|laptop|tablet|watch|glasses|earbuds|headphones|speaker|microphone|camera|laptop|tablet|watch|glasses|earbuds|headphones)\b', sentence)
    for device in physical_device:
        entities.append({"type": "Physical Device", "value": device})
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(patient|sun|old|young|man|woman|child|boy|girl|dog|cat|car|house|tree|road|street|city|country|world|earth|moon|sun|stars|clouds|rain|snow|wind|sun|moon|stars|clouds|rain|snow|wind)\b', sentence)
    for object in environment_object:
        entities.append({"type": "Environment Object", "value": object})
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database|magnetic stripe card|tap|hard disk|cloud|server|client|network|internet|web|browser|email|sms|phone|message|text|file|document|image|video|audio|music|song|picture|photo|graph|chart|table|map|location|position|coordinate|latitude|longitude|altitude|speed|direction|bearing|compass|gps|location|position|coordinate|latitude|longitude|altitude|speed|direction|bearing|compass|gps)\b', sentence)
    for system in external_system:
        entities.append({"type": "External System", "value": system})
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(dynamic lane control|security|performance|usability|accessibility|reliability|maintainability|scalability|flexibility|adapatability|compatibility|interoperability|conformance|compliance|regulation|standard|law|policy|procedure|guideline|best practice|good practice|industry standard|standard practice|common practice|best practice|good practice|industry standard|standard practice|common practice)\b', sentence)
    for requirement in system_requirements:
        entities.append({"type": "System Requirements", "value": requirement})
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(username|password|lane plan|data|information|message|text|file|document|image|video|audio|music|song|picture|photo|graph|chart|table|map|location|position|coordinate|latitude|longitude|altitude|speed|direction|bearing|compass|gps|location|position|coordinate|latitude|longitude|altitude|speed|direction|bearing|compass|gps)\b', sentence)
    for phenomenon in shared_phenomena:
        entities.append({"type": "Shared Phenomena", "value": phenomenon})
    
    return json.dumps(entities)
```

```python
    entities = []
    schema = {
        'Software System': r'\bThe Center\b',

        'System Requirements': r'\bstatus information\b',
        'Shared Phenomena': r'\b'
    }
    
    for entity_type, pattern in schema.items():
        if entity_type == 'Shared Phenomena':
            continue
        matches = re.findall(pattern, sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
        for match in matches:
            entities.append({"type": entity_type, "name": match})
    
    return entities
``` 

```python
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) device"

    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) database"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"support the following information for ([A-Za-z0-9\s]+) request"
```

```python
        entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Extract Physical Device

    if physical_device:
        entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Extract Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\bthe\s*map\b', sentence)
    if environment_object:
        entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # Extract External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\bthe\s*database\b', sentence)
    if external_system:
        entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # Extract System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\btraffic\s*conditions\b', sentence)
    if system_requirements:
        entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Extract Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = []
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities
``` 

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = [system for system in software_systems if system.isalpha()]

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [device for device in physical_devices if device.isalpha() and device.lower() not in ["the", "a", "an"]]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [object for object in environment_objects if object.isalpha() and object.lower() not in ["the", "a", "an"]]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [system for system in external_systems if system.isalpha() and system.lower() not in ["the", "a", "an"]]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement.isalpha() and requirement.lower() not in ["the", "a", "an"]]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon.isalpha() and phenomenon.lower() not in ["the", "a", "an"]]

    return entities
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_systems

    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = [device for device in physical_devices if device not in entities["Software System"]]

    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = [obj for obj in environment_objects if obj not in entities["Software System"] and obj not in entities["Physical Device"]]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b[A-Z][a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [system for system in external_systems if system not in entities["Software System"] and system not in entities["Physical Device"] and system not in entities["Environment Object"]]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [req for req in system_requirements if req not in entities["Software System"] and req not in entities["Physical Device"] and req not in entities["Environment Object"] and req not in entities["External System"]]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b[a-z,A-Z]+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [phenomena for phenomena in shared_phenomena if phenomena not in entities["Software System"] and phenomena not in entities["Physical Device"] and phenomena not in entities["Environment Object"] and phenomena not in entities["External System"] and phenomena not in entities["System Requirements"]]

    return entities

print(extract_entities(sentence))
```

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {"Software System": [], "Physical Device": [], "Environment Object": [], "External System": [], "System Requirements": [], "Shared Phenomena": []}
    
    # Software System
    software_system = re.findall(r'\b(system|software|app|application)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_device = re.findall(r'\b(mobile|phone|computer|device|machine|equipment)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_object = re.findall(r'\b(person|patient|sun|old|environment|object)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object
    
    # External System
    external_system = re.findall(r'\b(database|card|tap|disk|system|network|internet|cloud)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["External System"] = external_system
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(require|need|must|shall|should|can|could|will|would)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(send|receive|get|put|store|access|modify|delete|update|create|read|write)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b(message|data|information|value|state|event|event|status|condition|property|attribute)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    system_requirements = [f"{word} {phrase}" for word, phrase in zip(system_requirements, re.findall(r'\b(to|from|with|in|on|at|by|for|of|from|with|in|on|at|by|for|of)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE))]
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b(event|state|value|status|condition|property|attribute)\b', sentence, re.IGNORECASE)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena
    
    return entities

# Test the function

print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send a message to the user through the mobile phone, which is connected to the internet."))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send a message to the user through the mobile phone, which is connected to the internet, and the user is a person."))
``` 

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Software System
    software_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in software_systems:
        if word.lower() in ["system", "software"]:
            entities["Software System"].append(word)
    
    # Physical Device
    physical_devices = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in physical_devices:
        if word.lower() in ["device", "computer", "phone", "network", "server", "hard disk", "tap", "magnetic stripe card"]:
            entities["Physical Device"].append(word)
    
    # Environment Object
    environment_objects = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in environment_objects:
        if word.lower() in ["patient", "sun", "old"]:
            entities["Environment Object"].append(word)
    
    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in external_systems:
        if word.lower() in ["database", "hard disk", "tap", "magnetic stripe card"]:
            entities["External System"].append(word)
    
    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in system_requirements:
        if word.lower() in ["capability", "select", "network", "identifier"]:
            entities["System Requirements"].append(word)
    
    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    for word in shared_phenomena:
        if word.lower() in ["event", "state", "value"]:
            entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(word)
    
    return entities
```

```python
import json

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Split the sentence into words
    words = sentence.split()
    
    # Define the keywords for each entity type
    keywords = {
        "Software System": ["system", "software"],
        "Physical Device": ["device", "meter", "card", "disk"],
        "Environment Object": ["center", "patient", "sun", "old"],
        "External System": ["database", "magnetic", "stripe", "tap"],
        "System Requirements": ["target", "plan", "requirement"],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }
    
    # Iterate over each word in the sentence
    for word in words:
        # Iterate over each entity type
        for entity_type, keyword_list in keywords.items():
            # Check if the word matches any of the keywords for the current entity type
            if word.lower() in [keyword.lower() for keyword in keyword_list]:
                # If it does, add the word to the list of entities for the current entity type
                entities[entity_type].append(word)
    
    # Convert the entities dictionary to a JSON string
    return json.dumps(entities)
```

    entities["Environment Object"] = [object for object in environment_objects if object.lower() != "the" and object.lower() != "a"]

    # External System
    external_systems = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["External System"] = [system for system in external_systems if system.lower() != "the" and system.lower() != "a"]

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = [requirement for requirement in system_requirements if requirement.lower() != "the" and requirement.lower() != "a"]

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena = re.findall(r'\b\w+\b', sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = [phenomenon for phenomenon in shared_phenomena if phenomenon.lower() != "the" and phenomenon.lower() != "a"]

```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
``` 
```python
    software_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+implemented\s+using\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    software_system_match = re.search(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    if software_system_match:
        entities["Software System"].append(software_system_match.group(1))
        entities["System Requirements"].append(software_system_match.group(2))

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)\s+shall\s+be\s+implemented\s+using\s+([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    physical_device_match = re.search(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    if physical_device_match:
        entities["Physical Device"].append(physical_device_match.group(1))

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    environment_object_match = re.search(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    if environment_object_match:
        entities["Environment Object"].append(environment_object_match.group(1))

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    external_system_match = re.search(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    if external_system_match:
        entities["External System"].append(external_system_match.group(1))

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"([A-Za-z0-9\s]+)"
    shared_phenomena_match = re.search(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    if shared_phenomena_match:
        entities["Shared Phenomena"].append(shared_phenomena_match.group(1))

    return entities
```

## Code
```python
import re

def extract_entities(sentence):
    entities = {
        "Software System": [],
        "Physical Device": [],
        "Environment Object": [],
        "External System": [],
        "System Requirements": [],
        "Shared Phenomena": []
    }

    # Software System
    software_system_pattern = r"the\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+system)?"
    software_system_matches = re.findall(software_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Software System"] = software_system_matches

    # Physical Device
    physical_device_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+device)?"
    physical_device_matches = re.findall(physical_device_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Physical Device"] = physical_device_matches

    # Environment Object
    environment_object_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+object)?"
    environment_object_matches = re.findall(environment_object_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Environment Object"] = environment_object_matches

    # External System
    external_system_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+system)?"
    external_system_matches = re.findall(external_system_pattern, sentence)
    entities["External System"] = external_system_matches

    # System Requirements
    system_requirements_pattern = r"shall\s+be\s+able\s+to\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+and\s+)?\w+"
    system_requirements_matches = re.findall(system_requirements_pattern, sentence)
    entities["System Requirements"] = system_requirements_matches

    # Shared Phenomena
    shared_phenomena_pattern = r"(?:the|a)\s+(?:\w+\s+)?\w+(?:\s+event)?"
    shared_phenomena_matches = re.findall(shared_phenomena_pattern, sentence)
    entities["Shared Phenomena"] = shared_phenomena_matches

    return entities

# Test the function
print(extract_entities("The Remote Control GUI shall be implemented using C/C++ and ESRI Map Objects."))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send a message to the user."))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send a message to the user, who is a person."))
print(extract_entities("The system shall be able to send a message to the user, who is a person, and the message shall be stored in a database."))
```
